channel.title: Stockwatch - Key Events
channel.description: Real-time corporate announcements, deals, and financial results.

item.title: [OSWALOR] Oswal Overseas Ltd Reports Q3 and Nine Months Financial Results for 2025
item.description:
Oswal Overseas Ltd, a company in the Sugar Industry, has reported its financial results for the quarter and nine months ended on December 31, 2025. The results have been reviewed by the Audit Committee and approved by the Board of Directors. The company's performance varies from quarter to quarter due to the seasonal nature of the industry. The financial results are prepared in accordance with the Companies (Indian Accounting Standards) Rules, 2015. The Statutory Auditors have carried out a limited review of these results.

  • Revenue for the quarter and year ended is reported net of Goods and Services Tax (GST).
  • The company's performance varies from quarter to quarter due to the seasonal nature of the Sugar Industry.
  • The results have been reviewed by the Audit Committee and approved by the Board of Directors.
  • The Statutory Auditors have carried out a limited review of these results.

Company: OSWAL OVERSEAS LTD. | Category: Quarterly Result

item.title: [NEELKAN] Neelkanth Rockminerals Ltd Reports Q3 2025 Financial Results with 43.59 Lakhs Profit
item.description:
Neelkanth Rockminerals Ltd, a company with CIN NO. L14219RJ1988PLC062162, has reported its unaudited financial results for the half year ended 31st December, 2025. The company's revenue from operations was 1,17,540 Lakhs, with a total income of 1,21,306 Lakhs. The total expenses stood at 77,717 Lakhs, resulting in a profit before exceptional items and tax of 43,599 Lakhs. The company reported a net profit of 37,010 Lakhs for the period from continuing operations. The earnings per share for continuing and discontinued operations were 0.10 (basic) and 0.06 (diluted) respectively. The company operates in the segment of 'Granite and other materials' and does not have any subsidiary company.

  • Revenue from operations: 1,17,540 Lakhs
  • Total income: 1,21,306 Lakhs
  • Profit before exceptional items and tax: 43,599 Lakhs
  • Net profit: 37,010 Lakhs
  • No subsidiary company

item.title: [NAGARFERT] Nagarjuna Fertilizers and Chemicals Ltd Appoints New Directors
item.description:
Nagarjuna Fertilizers and Chemicals Ltd has appointed Ms. Lalitha Raghuram as Non-Executive Director and Ms. Shilpi Varshney as Independent Director. Ms. Lalitha Raghuram is a First class post-graduate in Social Work and Commerce with advanced accounting & auditing. She has received the â€˜Womentorâ€™ Award in 2018 and the â€˜International Eye Care Hero Awardâ€™ in 2018. Ms. Shilpi Varshney holds master's degrees in human resource development & English Literature and is a Senior social impact and skill development professional with over 28 years of experience. She is presently associated with All India Society for Electronics and Computer Technology (AISECT) as Director, Projects and Skill Development.

  • Appointment of Ms. Lalitha Raghuram as Non-Executive Director
  • Appointment of Ms. Shilpi Varshney as Independent Director
  • Ms. Lalitha Raghuram is a First class post-graduate in Social Work and Commerce
  • Ms. Shilpi Varshney is a Senior social impact and skill development professional with over 28 years of experience
  • Ms. Lalitha Raghuram has received the â€˜Womentorâ€™ Award in 2018 and the â€˜International Eye Care Hero Awardâ€™ in 2018
  • Ms. Shilpi Varshney is presently associated with All India Society for Electronics and Computer Technology (AISECT) as Director, Projects and Skill Development

item.title: [KIMIABL] Kimia Biosciences Ltd: Board Meeting Approves Un-audited Financial Results, Re-Appointment of Managing Director, and More
item.description:
Kimia Biosciences Limited, a company based at Gurgaon, Sohna Road, recently held a Board Meeting where several important decisions were made. The Board approved the un-audited financial results of the Company for the quarter and nine months ended on 31* December, 2025. The Managing Director, Mr. Sameer Goel, was re-appointed for a further period of five years. The Board also approved the re-appointment of Mr. Kaku Vijaya Shekhar Reddy as Whole time Director and the re-constitution of the Committees of the Board of Directors. The meeting commenced at 01:00 PM and concluded at 02:00 PM.

  • Approval of Un-audited financial results for the quarter and nine months ended on 31* December, 2025
  • Re-appointment of Mr. Sameer Goel as Managing Director for a further period of five years
  • Re-appointment of Mr. Kaku Vijaya Shekhar Reddy as Whole time Director
  • Re-constitution of the Committees of the Board of Directors

item.title: [ADINATH] Adinath Textiles Reports Q3 and Nine Months Results, Profit for the Period at 13.65 Lacs
item.description:
Adinath Textiles Ltd. has reported its unaudited financial results for the quarter and nine months ended 31st December 2025. The company's revenue from operations for the quarter is 33.72 Lacs, with a profit before tax of 3.92 Lacs. The company does not have any subsidiaries, associates, or joint venture companies. The results have been prepared in accordance with the Ind AS notified under the Companies Act, 2013. The company has made provisions for gratuity & Leave with Wages liability to employees on an estimated basis for the quarter ending on 31st December 2025.

  • Revenue from operations for the quarter is 33.72 Lacs
  • Profit before tax for the quarter is 3.92 Lacs
  • No subsidiaries, associates, or joint venture companies
  • Results prepared in accordance with Ind AS notified under the Companies Act, 2013
  • Provisions made for gratuity & Leave with Wages liability to employees on an estimated basis

item.title: [KALLAM] Kallam Textiles Ltd. Approves Q3 and Nine Months Financial Results for 2025, Plans Sale of Investments
item.description:
Kallam Textiles Ltd. has approved the un-audited financial results for the quarter and nine months ended 31st December 2025. The company reported a profit before tax and exceptional items of INR 1,966.24 lakhs for the quarter and INR 1,915.87 lakhs for the nine months period. However, the profit after tax showed a loss of INR 1,978.58 lakhs for the quarter and INR 1,928.21 lakhs for the nine months period. The company also announced its plans to sell 7,15,000 equity shares in M/s Espar Pack Pvt Ltd and 3,18,305 equity shares in Shivani Power Spinners Pvt Ltd, subject to necessary approvals and compliance. The company's independent auditors, Brahmayya & Co, have expressed a material uncertainty that may cast significant doubt on the company's ability to continue as a going concern due to continuous losses, default in repayment of financial debts, and legal actions for recovery of dues.

  • Kallam Textiles Ltd. approved the un-audited financial results for Q3 and nine months ended 31st December 2025.
  • The company reported a profit before tax and exceptional items of INR 1,966.24 lakhs for the quarter and INR 1,915.87 lakhs for the nine months period.
  • The profit after tax showed a loss of INR 1,978.58 lakhs for the quarter and INR 1,928.21 lakhs for the nine months period.
  • The company plans to sell 7,15,000 equity shares in M/s Espar Pack Pvt Ltd and 3,18,305 equity shares in Shivani Power Spinners Pvt Ltd, subject to necessary approvals and compliance.
  • The company's independent auditors have expressed a material uncertainty regarding the company's ability to continue as a going concern.

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Kallam Textiles Ltd-$ | Category: Quarterly Result

item.title: [DCMSRMIND] DCM Shriram Industries Ltd Reports Q3 and Nine Months Unaudited Financial Results for the Period Ended 31.12.2025
item.description:
DCM Shriram Industries Ltd has announced its unaudited financial results for the quarter and nine months ended 31st December 2025. The company's revenue, expenses, and net profit have been reported. The results reflect the impact of a Composite Scheme of Arrangement, including the amalgamation of Lily Commercial Private Limited and the demerger of the Chemical and Rayon undertakings into DCM Shriram Fine Chemical Limited and DCM Shriram International Limited, respectively.

  • Unaudited financial results for the quarter and nine months ended 31st December 2025
  • Impact of a Composite Scheme of Arrangement, including amalgamation and demerger
  • Revenue, expenses, and net profit reported
  • Adjustments made for cancellation of shares and investments
  • Creation of Amalgmation deficit adjustment account

item.title: [SUNDARAM] Sundaram Multi Pap Ltd Approves Unaudited Financial Statement for Q3 2025
item.description:
Sundaram Multi Pap Ltd held a board meeting on February 14, 2026, to consider and approve the unaudited standalone financial statement for the quarter ended on December 31, 2025. The meeting commenced at 11.00 A.M. and concluded at 02.00 P.M. The board approved the unaudited standalone financial results for the quarter and nine months ended on December 31, 2025. The company's revenue from operations stands at 2,606.83 Lacs for the quarter ended and 9,276.26 Lacs for the nine months ended. The net profit for the period is 161.99 Lacs.

  • Sundaram Multi Pap Ltd held a board meeting to approve the unaudited financial statement for Q3 2025.
  • The meeting resulted in the approval of the unaudited standalone financial results for the quarter and nine months ended on December 31, 2025.
  • The company's revenue from operations stands at 2,606.83 Lacs for the quarter ended and 9,276.26 Lacs for the nine months ended.
  • The net profit for the period is 161.99 Lacs.
